sentences.en: A crafty knave needs no broker.
sentences.cn: 狡猾的无赖无需中间人.

sentences.en: A crafty look came to his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他眼中闪出狡黠的神情。

sentences.en: A crafty person has more than one hideout.
Crafty men and statesmen will be shown misled by all their elaborate calculations.
sentences.cn: 奸诈的人和政治家,虽然费尽心机,总是害了自己.

sentences.en: Do not trust him, he is as crafty as a fox.
sentences.cn: 别相信他, 他象狐狸一样狡猾.

sentences.en: He admired the old man for his crafty plan.
sentences.cn: 他敬佩老者的神机妙算.

sentences.en: He considered himself a crafty man — a man would have to get up very early in the morning to put one over on Alf Tandy.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己太狡猾了——为了愚弄一下阿尔夫·坦迪通常得早上很早起床。
他是个奸诈狡猾的家伙。

sentences.en: That crafty prince was espoused three times.
sentences.cn: 那位狡黠的君主结过三次婚.

sentences.en: That was my crafty little plan.
The crafty man fled from honest work in the cane fields.
sentences.cn: 那工于心计的人逃避甘蔗园的诚实劳动.

sentences.en: Their schemes to evade taxes were very crafty.
sentences.cn: 他们逃税的计谋非常狡猾.

sentences.en: This fellow is very crafty; we had better be on our guard.
sentences.cn: 这个家伙诡计多端, 我们可得小心点儿.

trans.tran_cn: 狡猾的，狡诈的，巧妙的，灵巧的
trans.tran_en: good at getting what you want by clever planning and by secretly deceiving people
